Name: Cramit's Keep
About the game: Narrative High in the Crescent Peaks, the Archmage Cramit has imprisoned his son for his disobedience. The Archmageâ€™s Keep is ever-changing-- an endless maze, where a door may never lead to t he same room twice. Trapped within, Cramit the Younger must fight to escape with his life. Combat Fight your way through the lower dungeons of Cramits keep. Engage in a plethora of enemies types and fight the evil Archmage. Level Up Customize Cramits spells, powers, and stats. Create unique builds to clear as many rooms as possible before enemies overwhelm you!
